review: It would be easy to simply dismiss this device as 'just another smart TV attempt', but it offers something that the others don't right now!  Sling TV!!!The Fire Stick is as dirt simple to setup as it can get.  The only way that a person couldn't get this item setup, is to leave it in the box.  I kid you not, there just isn't any way to mess up the installation.  It comes with a short extension cable, which is great, since Sony is still designing their sets like a room full of meatheads.  The range on this device is fabulous.  I had it downstairs in our theater area with the wi-fi upstairs and was still able to stream this quality of video (please see pics!).  The shots were taken from 18 feet away, with a 150" projector image (the speakers are four feet tall, just to give you a sense of scale)Regarding Sling TV: it's absolutely fabulous!!  Amazon did a great job of making their platform open to so many apps, with this being one of the best!!  Sling TV is EXACTLY what I've been waiting for at a reasonable price point, to boot!  ESPN, ESPN2, TNT, History, H2, HGTV, CNN, Travel, and Food Network!!  Throw in TBS, A&E;, IFC and you've got the best channels (my opinion, I know) for an excellent price!!  The video quality is great!  It's not quite HD, but it's not very far off!The best part is that I got the Fire Stick free with the promo they're running right now!  3 months of Sling TV = free Fire Stick!!  You really can't get better!  Cut off your cable or satellite and get Sling TV with the free Fire Stick!  (No, I don't work for them, just really flippin' overjoyed that I'm getting my most watched channels at 1/5th the price that I was paying!!)  Woo-hoo!

review: This product should really still be in beta, as it's definitely not yet ready for prime time (no pun intended). Apps often crash, the UI is confusing to navigate, and we have had to hard reboot the stick at least once a week with daily use because the software would hang.I do not recommend this to anyone. We're getting an Apple TV to replace it.

review: For what it is, it's alright. I have the original Apple TV (with 40GB HD) and it moves about as fast. Some videos load waaaaay faster on FTV than ATV could ever wish to do. But I think the wifi only makes this dongle lag slightly. I've noticed video jerkiness and audio out-of-sync frequently, which I rarely see on my integrated smart tv or on ATV. I'll keep it because it was cheap and it does a few nice things (Prime video, Netflix, Hulu) that I can't do otherwise easily. The prime interface is waaaaay Better than on my old Samsung TV.

review: It's a great gadget to have! However, it totally sucks that Amazon has now placed this at 39.00 when it wasn't long I ordered this and paid $99.00 ! Are you Kidding me..(laughing ) Well here goes the review first wait a while before purchasing and I do mean wait as you can see the price lowers drastically. Next, this little gadget is nice especially when traveling and staying in hotels. Our teen enjoys watching movies , playing games and such. So, on rainy days when on vacation this is sure to keep you entertained if you prefer not to be out in a down pour. It saves money as well from buying movies when your on vacation..thats a plus as hotels charge a bit much.Waiting in an airport on long lay overs wahlah you've got the magic stick to keep you from being bored out of your mind.
